import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; const AboutUsScreen = () => { return (

About Us

Welcome to our e-commerce platform! We are passionate about bringing you the best products at affordable prices.

Our mission is to provide excellent service and top-quality products to enhance your shopping experience. Thank you for choosing us!

Our Values

- Customer satisfaction is our priority.

- Commitment to innovation and growth.

Contact Us

); }; export default AboutUsScreen;
